comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: This is probably Detrick Parmenter, a 1912 All-American from Harvard.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- your title misspells his name.

comment.author: 45177340@N05
comment._content: This is a great picture. You can really see the evolution of football from 1912 to 2009. The size difference of modern football players to old school football players is amazing.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: rjones0856, Richard Arthur Norton and Wystan, Thanks for your input on the identity of this Harvard football player, and the date of the photo. Further research indicates he is Derrick Parmenter, Harvard Class of 1913. His name is confirmed in the Harvard Alumni Bulletin, vol. 23 and Harvard Football by Bernard M. Corbett. (Note in the alumni bulletin, Google Books' character recognition software picked up his first name as Detrick, but it is actually Derrick in the text.) We will add his correct name and the date from the negative when we update this record.

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Yeah, that's where I got the misspelling.  Teach me to trust Google.  :)
